@graph.rdfs:label: Organization
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Organization schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the organization, team or group
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Alternative names or commonly used abbreviations for the organization, team or group
@graph.rdfs:label: alternateName

@graph.rdfs:comment: An overarching consortia, multi-institutional team or group in which the organization/team/group is a member or affiliate
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The status of the organization's membership or affiliation in the overarching consortial, multi-institutional team or group (current, past)
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliationStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: Members of this organization, team, or group
@graph.rdfs:label: members

@graph.rdfs:comment: Status of the members of this organization
@graph.rdfs:label: membershipStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource which a person played a role
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: A classification of the organization by a resource. Eg- for ClinicalTrials funders, it's ["U.S. National Institutes of Health", "Other U.S. Federal agencies", "Industry", "All others"]
@graph.rdfs:label: class

@graph.rdfs:comment: The role of an organization in its involvement with a resource
@graph.rdfs:label: role
Person
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Person schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Alternative ways in which the person's name is included in a record
@graph.rdfs:label: alternateName

@graph.rdfs:comment: The given name of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: givenName

@graph.rdfs:comment: The family name of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: familyName

@graph.rdfs:comment: The organization with which the person is affiliated or has membership in
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The status of the person's membership or affiliation in an organization, team or group (current, past)
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliationStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: The ORCID ID of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: orcid

@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource which a person played a role
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: The role a person played in the creation of a resource
@graph.rdfs:label: role
DataDownload
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the DataDownload schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the download if available
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Link to the location where the dataset can be found, ideally a permanent URL
@graph.rdfs:label: contentUrl

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date which the particular DataDownload (file) has been changed
@graph.rdfs:label: dateModified
MonetaryGrant
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the MonetaryGrant schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the monetary grant
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The grant ID or an identifier associated with the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: The url for the grant (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: url

@graph.rdfs:comment: The funding organization of the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: funder

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the funding organization
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The person or organization to whom or to which the grant was awarded
@graph.rdfs:label: recipient

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the recipient of the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The affiliation of the recipient of the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation
Analysis
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Analysis schema used for outbreak.info.

@graph.rdfs:label: Dataset
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Dataset schema used for outbreak.info.

description.description: Longer description of what is contained in the dataset

measurementTechnique.description: A technique or technology used in a Dataset, corresponding to the method used for measuring the corresponding variable(s).

variableMeasured.description: A technique or technology used in a Dataset, corresponding to the method used for measuring the corresponding variable(s).

doi.description: The DOI for the dataset if available

author.description: Name of the author or organization that created the dataset.  Note: schema.org/author and schema.org/organization have additional fields that can provide more information about the author/organization, if desired.

funding.description: Funding that supports (sponsors) the collection of this dataset through some kind of financial contribution

license.description: A license document that applies to this content, typically indicated by URL.

species.description: Species(es) from which dataset has been collected

infectiousAgent.description: infectious agents(s) which are the focus of the dataset

infectiousDisease.description: The disease or medical conditions caused by the infectious agent. Important as some agents may cause multiple diseases

keywords.description: A list of keywords associated with this dataset

isBasedOn.description: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) on which this dataset was derived (stored as an object, not a string)

citedBy.description: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) which is derived from this dataset (stored as an object, not a string)

relatedTo.description: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) which is related to the dataset but is not a derivative nor was derived from the dataset (stored as an object, not a string)

curatedBy.description: The source from which this Dataset was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another.

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

controlledVocabulary.description: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

miscControlledVocabulary.description: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

speciesControlledVocabulary.description: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

diseaseVocabulary.description: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

moreControlledVocabulary.definition: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

baseOrgObject.description: A barebones Organization object to work around recursion issues in DDE

alternateName.description: Alternate name or Acronym for the organization.

memberObject.description: Reusable person definition accounting for recursion issues in DDE

name.description: The name of the monetary grant that funded/funds the Dataset

identifier.description: Unique identifier(s) for the grant(s) used to fund the Dataset

citation.description: A citation object for a resource which is cited by the dataset (ie- is a derivative of the dataset) , related to the dataset, or from which the dataset was based on (ie- is derived from).

name.description: Name of or title of the citation

identifier.description: An identifier associated with the citation

url.description: The url of the resource cited.

versionDate.description: The version date of the resource used at the time of the creation of the citation as certain resources (protocols, datasets) may change frequently over time.

citeText.description: The bibliographic citation for the referenced resource as is provided

@graph.rdfs:comment: Short, descriptive title for the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Longer description of what was contained in the dataset. For example, dataset fields, ...
@graph.rdfs:label: description

@graph.rdfs:comment: Measurement technique(s) used in collecting the dataset, e.g. RNA sequencing
@graph.rdfs:label: measurementTechnique

@graph.rdfs:comment: The factors or variables measured in the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: variableMeasured

@graph.rdfs:comment: person, people, or organization that created the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: author

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the author as provided by the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The author's affiliation(s)
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: Available downloads of the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: distribution

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the download if available
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Link to the location where the dataset can be found, ideally a permanent URL
@graph.rdfs:label: contentUrl

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date which the particular DataDownload (file) has been changed
@graph.rdfs:label: dateModified

@graph.rdfs:comment: Funding for the generation of the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: funding

@graph.rdfs:comment: Name of the funding organization ofr the dataset. Note: schema.org/funder and schema.org/Grant have additional fields that can provide more information about the funding organization, if desired
@graph.rdfs:label: funder

@graph.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the grant (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Species(es) from which dataset has been collected
@graph.rdfs:label: species

@graph.rdfs:comment: The actual infectious agent, such as a specific bacterium
@graph.rdfs:label: infectiousAgent

@graph.rdfs:comment: The infectious disease or medical condition caused by the infectious agent, such as a Covid-19
@graph.rdfs:label: infectiousDisease

@graph.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: DOI for the dataset if available
@graph.rdfs:label: doi

@graph.rdfs:comment: License associated with re-use of the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: license

@graph.rdfs:comment: Associated resource (protocols, publications, etc.) that utilized or was derived from this dataset.
@graph.rdfs:label: citedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the resource (publication, protocol, etc.) utilize or was derived from this dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type of resource which utilized or was derived from this dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier for this resource which utilized or was derived from this dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Associated resource (guidelines, protocols, publications, etc.) from which this dataset was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: isBasedOn

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the associated resource from which this dataset was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of resource (publication, analysis, ClinicalTrial, dataset, etc.) from which this dataset was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: Identifier for the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: date of the version of the resource from which this dataset was derived. Note this is NOT the same as dateModified, as the dataset may be based on an earlier 'dateModified' than is what is available from the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: versionDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: Other resources related to, but not a derivative of nor derived from this dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier (if available) of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Applicable outbreak.info category
@graph.rdfs:label: topicCategory

@graph.rdfs:comment: keywords
@graph.rdfs:label: keywords

@graph.rdfs:comment: The source from which this dataset was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another
@graph.rdfs:label: curatedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the source from which this dataset was identified for inclusion
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date this resource was added to outbreak.info, or the date when this resource was updated in outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: curationDate
Protocol
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Protocol schema used for outbreak.info.

@graph.rdfs:label: Publication
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Publication schema used for outbreak.info.

@graph.rdfs:label: ClinicalTrial
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the ClinicalTrial schema used for outbreak.info.
